definitions.example: The assassin exploded the car by means of a car bomb.
They sought to explode the myth.

definitions.definition: To create an exploded view of.
definitions.example: Explode the assembly drawing so that all the fasteners are visible.

definitions.definition: To blast, to blow up, to burst, to detonate, to go off.
To make a violent or emotional outburst.
definitions.example: She exploded when I criticised her hat.

definitions.definition: (PHP) To break (a delimited string of text) into several smaller strings by removing the separators.
To decompress (data) that was previously imploded.
To open all doors and hatches on an automobile.
